parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the management node.

> You can call the [ListHoneypotNode](~~ListHoneypotNode~~) operation to query the IDs of management nodes.

parameters.name: NodeName
parameters.description: The name of the management node.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupProbeIpList
parameters.description: The CIDR blocks that are allowed to access the management node.
